simple_declarations_of_love: I love unicorns more than anything.
My heart is full of love for unicorns.
I love unicorns with all my heart.
I love unicorns every single day.
constant_thoughts: I think about unicorns all the time.
I am thinking about unicorns right now.
I cannot stop thinking about unicorns.
I think about unicorns all day long.
I think about unicorns every morning.
I think about unicorns every night.
My mind is full of thoughts about unicorns.
I constantly think about the unicorn.
I spend my time thinking about unicorns.
All I do is think about unicorns.
My thoughts are always about unicorns.
favorite_creature_assertions: The unicorn is my favorite creature.
